page.title: 12HOUSING continued
page.content:
throughout and 70 feet of totally fenced rear garden.The accomodation briefly comprises:porchway,entance, hall, lounge with sliding doors to dining room,with french door to exterior.To the first floor there are 3 double bedrooms, one with full height wardrobes, half tiled bathroom and w.c. storage space in the roof. Built in single garage and built in store. good decrative order throughout. A fully fitted kitchen with door to exterior. A damp proof course is needed throughout.
DETACHED FAMILY HOUSE in private,secluded position.PRICE Â£105,000. Full gas fired central heating.Comprises,lounge,dining room,study,fitted kitchen,4 bedrooms,2 bathrooms.Attached double garage,large gardens,space for boat/caravan.
